title: foo
body:
1. Who is going to perform technical validation? (Provide name and contact #): xmatters Azure_Support
2. When will the technical validation occur? Start date and time: Day of or after release
3. When will the functionality be turned on (toggle on) to the users? Immediately preceding release
4. Who is going to perform business/end user validation? (Provide name and contact #): Application teams
5. When will the end-user validation occur? Start date and time: Next business day
